name: SecLytics
description: This plugin will collect URL, IP, and CIDR indicators from the SecLytics BulkAPI.

configuration.label: Custom Endpoint
configuration.description: The path to your custom endpoint e.g. predictions-dump-d.json.gz.

configuration.label: Type of Threat data
configuration.description: Types of threat data to pull from the custom/default endpoint. Only indicators with matching types will be saved.

configuration.label: Access Token
configuration.description: The SecLytics access token with permission to access the BulkAPI

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the data for the initial run.

configuration.label: Severity
configuration.description: IP indicators of the selected severity level(s) will be pulled. Only applicable when you select IP in Type of Threat data.
